product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 0 Sleeping Bag - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 0 Sleeping Bag uses SkyLoft continuous-filament, hollow-fiber insulation that's highly compressible, lofty and light for comfort on year-round backpacking trips. Rated to keep you warm down to about 0degF for in spring, summer, fall and winter. Overlapping shingle construction helps eliminate cold spots to keep you warm at night. Full-length zipper. Nylon ripstop exterior is lined with soft polyester. The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 0 Sleeping Bag comes with a compression stuff sack. Special buy.
short_description: The ALPS Mountaineering Diamondback 0 Sleeping Bag uses SkyLoft continuous-filament, hollow-fiber insulation that's highly compressible, lofty and light for comfort on year-round backpacking trips.
